Line.MultilineString: You arrive back at the chapterhouse. There you are greeted by the first knight, and ushered inside. He hands you a blindfold and asks you to put it on. You are then guided gently through the building.
Eventually an unrecognised voice tells you to remove the blindfold.

You are standing on a platform, surrounded by a long drop. A series of platforms leads to a door at the other side of the room, with large gaps between. At the door the knight-captain stands, grinning.
"Your final trial is to test if you can persist and overcome dangerous situations. Do you have the wisdom to prevail? Show us!"
Sadly you don't quite have what it takes to join the order.
You finally make it to the door, where the knight-captain pulls you into a giant hug.
"Welcome to the chapter! I know you will do us proud."
